channel.title: 508 npcs
channel.description:
Hai, well i am makeing a money / training area on my server and alot of the npocs have a glitch of 0 hp and u hit them once n they die any body know how to fix this?
Thanks,
-Nate[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 05, 2009, 04:53:05 pm[/size][hr]anny body :' (?
